body: So I came up with this idea when I was thinking about how I love being a mod and helping out the server (The thing that I am most proud of). State one thing you're most proud of! It can be anything, it doesn't have to be on Avicus or Minecraft.

replies.body:
Becoming a (former) junior moderator, being a tournament committee member, being a mapdev, helping manage the issues repo and docs, and now am an interviewee.

I love this server. Everyone is awesome, and huge kudos to the directors for all they do, but especially the staff in general for help keeping the server a better place.

replies.body:
also in the "what is the dumbest thing you've ever done" post but still, pretty proud :3

3 things


1. I turned my pen into a "sniper" (can shoot everything in a 10m radius) and I shot my teachers laptop, turns out I broke it... screen and cords were broken...

2. I was like, 3 and I stole my mothers wallet and hid it, for a whole year, she cancelled her credit cards etc... she found it... I was in SO MUCH TROUBLE...

3. last year I decided to take those water skim balls, take of the outside layer, set it on fire, and throw it at my cousin's friend's neighbor... as usuall it blows up, but this blew up his stove, all his windows and his TV...

replies.body: Real quick, i need help lol, this is a stupid question. How do i post my own discussion on the forums?
replies.body_tagged: Real quick, i need help lol, this is a stupid question. How do i post my own discussion on the forums?

replies.body:
Find the category you want to post in and click on it. Go to the upper right corner and create a discussion. 

For example, if you want to post in "off topic", click on it and follow click the "new discussion" in the corner.
replies.body_tagged:
Find the category you want to post in and click on it. Go to the upper right corner and create a discussion. 

For example, if you want to post in "off topic", click on it and follow click the "new discussion" in the corner.
